content.question: Based on an analysis of the data, estimate the effective dose of atovaquone that causes a fifty percent reduction in growth of P. falciparum.

frqParts.text: Based on an analysis of the data, estimate the effective dose of atovaquone that causes a fifty percent reduction in growth of P. falciparum.

skill.text: 4.B: Describe data from a table or graph, including: i. identifying specific data points ii. describing trends and patterns in the data iii. describing relationships between variables
